mapper.select: SELECT A.product_id productId, A.name name, A.price price, A."desc" desc, B.addr addr, A.details details, A.cate_cd cateCd, A.cre_dt creDt, A.updt_dt updDt, A.user_lg userId, 'product-photos/' || A.image image, B.shop_id shopId, 'product-photos/' || B.image imageShop, B.desc descShop, B.shop_nm shopNm, B.phone phone FROM public.products A, public."usersShop" B WHERE A.user_lg = B.email AND product_id = #{productId}
SELECT 'product-photos/' || image_url image FROM public.images WHERE product_id = #{productId}

SELECT a.product_id productId, a.name name, a.price price, a."desc" desc, b.addr addr, a.details details, a.cate_cd cateCd, a.cre_dt creDt, a.updt_dt updDt, a.user_lg userId, 'product-photos/' || a.image image FROM public.products a left join public."usersShop" b on a.user_lg = b.email WHERE a.cate_cd = #{cateCd} ORDER BY a.cre_dt DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROW ONLY
